A transformation is considered, defined by \\( g(u) = U(x,t) \\) where U is an integrating factor related to u, potentially altering the system dynamics.

If an intervention involving a new function \\( h(u) = e^{Dt}u \\), where D is a constant matrix, is applied at a later time \\( t_1 \\), does the path of \\( U(x,T) \\) depend strictly on the original PDE and not on the transformations \\( g(u) \\) or \\( h(u) \\)?

The alterations induced by each transformation will influence the outcomes at t = T.
